name: art-sphere-frontend
description: Art Sphere is a platform that allows users to view and purchase various artworks, with features such as user authentication, gallery management, interactive artwork display, and secure purchasing options. The platform caters to three types of users: artists, viewers, and admins, each with their own set of features and functionalities. Built using a tech stack that includes React, Redux, Flask, and PostgreSQL, Art Sphere aims to provide a seamless and engaging experience for its users.
author: Sir Carter
